Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Agendas and Minutes](http://www.lancaster-tx.com/1546/Agenda-and-Minutes)

   Agendas and Minutes
2. #### [Elections](https://www.lancaster-tx.com/102/Elections)

   Find information about elections, including early voting, polling locations, and registering to vote.
3. #### [City Council](https://www.lancaster-tx.com/100/City-Council)

   Find meeting times for and a description of the City Council and its functions and responsibilities.
4. #### [Departments](https://www.lancaster-tx.com/101/Departments)

   View the complete listing of city departments.
5. #### [Transparency](https://www.lancaster-tx.com/105/Transparency)

   Learn about the steps the city is taking to ensure government transparency.
6. #### [FAQs](https://www.lancaster-tx.com/FAQ.aspx?TID=15)

   Read answers to frequently-asked city government questions.
7. #### [State, Federal & Local Resources](https://www.lancaster-tx.com/104/State-Federal-Local-Resources)

   Find links to state, federal, and local government resources.
